name: Flight of the Toast
description:
Flight of the Toast, by Caelyn Sandel

My attempt at a flagtoast entry for Flying Toast With Jam, this screensaver is a tribute to both the original After Dark program for Macintosh as well as the distinctive art style of Susan Kare. Thanks for shaping my childhood, gang.

Click on the speaker to disable or enable music, and the document icon to see the credits.

Want it fullscreen up to 1080p? Play it on my website:
http://inurashii.xyz/flight/

If you like my work and would like to see larger and more polished games from me, please consider supporting my Patreon.
